titleStmt.title: [Dialogue or communicacion betwene our sauiour Ihesu Chryste and a sinner, lately translated out of the Latin tonge in to englyshe.]

publicationStmt.publisher: In south wark by Johan Redman, for Robert Redman,

notesStmt.note: Title from leaf D8v, which reads: Thus endeth the Dialogue or communicacion betwene our sauiour Ihesu Chryste and a sinner.
Caption title, leaf A2r, reads: Here after foloweth the prologue, to the jentyll and loueynge readers hereof, that in the merites of Christes passion delyteth.
Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
